Affliction.name: Methamphetamine withdrawal
Affliction.description: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of methamphetamine withdrawal.

Affliction.name: Methamphetamine overdose
Affliction.description: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of methamphetamine overdose.

Affliction.name: Methamphetamine addiction
Affliction.description: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
